imdb.plot outline: Top Model India, Colors Infinity, is the franchise to the world- famous America's Next Top Model. Produced by Akash Sharma of Bulldog Media and Entertainment, he also produced the hit series India's Next Top Model. This is the first season, introducing the English version of INTM, along with male contestants.
imdb.title: Top Model India (Colors Infinity)
